name: Buttered Herbed Corn And Carrot
description: This Buttered Herbed Corn and Carrot recipe is perfect for those who are looking for a healthy, low-carb, and low-sugar side dish. Its simple yet delicious flavors will complement any main course, making it a must-try for healthy recipe enthusiasts.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the Baby Corn and Carrots under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the carrots into thin rounds.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the Baby Corn into halves.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to a boil and blanch the Baby Corn and Carrots for 3 minutes, then drain and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, melt 1 tbsp of Butter over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the blanched Baby Corn and Carrots to the pan and saut√© for 5 minutes, or until they are slightly softened and coated with butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot as a delicious and nutritious side dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
